instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to the index.html head immediately.
2. TAILWIND CONFIG: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (primary, secondary, status) and font families (Rajdhani, Inter, Mono).
3. GLOBAL CSS: Add the base styles for the dark theme in index.css. Ensure body background is #0B0C10.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components, always override the default background with 'bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl' and borders with 'border-white/10'.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Ensure all charts have 'responsiveContainer' and use the custom palette colors.
6. ANIMATIONS: Implement 'framer-motion' for smooth page transitions and card hover effects. Use 'AnimatePresence' for route changes.
7. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute.
8. DO NOT use purple/violet gradients. Stick to the defined Solar(Amber), Battery(Green), Grid(Blue) palette.
9. MOCK DATA: Since backend might not be ready, create a robust 'mockData.js' file to populate the dashboard with realistic solar/battery values.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
